New Records: Desmond Bane made 6 of 10 from 3-point range
Josh Giddey finished with 12 points, eight assists and 13 rebounds
Key Match Events: The Bulls overcame a 20-point deficit to win the game
The Bulls outscored the Grizzlies 33-23 in the fourth quarter
Zach LaVine scored 11 points in the fourth quarter
Josh Giddey's key offensive rebound in the final seconds helped seal the win
Post-Match Reflections: Chicago used a fourth-quarter rush starting with about nine minutes left
The Grizzlies continue to squander leads in the third quarter
The Bulls' comeback was capped by a 3-pointer by LaVine
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls committed only nine turnovers, and Memphis had 10
The Bulls entertain Orlando on Wednesday, while Memphis plays at home against the Nets on Wednesday night
